message_text:
Today's pause is called "Body Scan".

Press ▶️ to watch a video to practise taking a pause together
Press ▶️ to listen to an audio and practise taking a pause together

Begin by taking a full breath in and a long breath out. 

Now bringing awareness to the top of your body, your head, face, neck, shoulders. 

Noticing any sensations, movements, any places of holding.
